name: HandHygiene
0:
”Alexa, open Hand Hygiene”
”Alexa, start Hand Hygiene”
”Alexa, launch Hand Hygiene”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hand hygiene
des:
This skill was created on the need to enlighten the public on hand hygiene.

Washing your hands properly is one of the most important things you can do to help prevent and control the spread of many illnesses.

So we bring to you this public awareness and enlightenment skill.

Disclaimer:
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
